A nutcase went wild in Memphis. An armed civilian stopped him.
 
 Ray
 
 The story from the AP:
 
 http://ca.news.yahoo.com/s/21072006/2/world-8-grocery-employees-stabbed-tennessee-store-co-worker-custody.html&printer=1
 
 "When he turned around and saw my pistol, he threw the knife away, put his hands up and got on the ground," Cope said. 
 
 "He saw my gun and that was pretty much it."
